definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

pinyin: zhong1 zi3 she4 xian4 she4 ying3

definition: beta ray (electron stream from radioactive decay)

pinyin: zi4 dong4 she4 xian4 she4 ying3

sentences.english: The beholder likes to use this ray on any foe it considers a real threat.
sentences.chinese: 眼魔喜欢将此射线用于它认为真正有威胁的对手。

sentences.english: The previously known most distant object was a short-lived gamma ray burst.
sentences.chinese: 之前所知最遥远的天体是一次短期的伽玛射线暴。

sentences.english: The X-ray input window is made of aluminum or beryllium.
sentences.chinese: 其中，X射线入射窗的窗材是铝或铍。

sentences.english: The physical and chemical properties of the carbon black are detected, and its microstructure is analysed by High Revolution Electromicroscopy (HREM) and X-ray Diffraction.
sentences.chinese: 射线衍射和高分辨率透射电镜分析了样品的微观结构。

sentences.english: Materials through which no radiation is propagated are called opaque .
sentences.chinese: 辐射线不能透过的物质叫不透明体。

sentences.english: Using this method, the spectral purity of a number of X-ray tubes was determined.
sentences.chinese: 用这一方法，对许多X射线管进行了测定。

sentences.english: A radiographic marker is received within the sealed inorganic metallic cylinder.
sentences.chinese: 在所述密封的无机金属圆筒内置入射线照像标记物。

sentences.english: This radiation, in its turn is absorbed and reemitted.
sentences.chinese: 这新的射线再次被吸收，而后释放。

sentences.english: Well, the X-ray shows your bone hasn's been injured.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，x光射线显示你的骨头未受损伤。

sentences.english: The only jerk I knew from my day was Shawn Ray.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的金牌，我知道我的一天萧恩射线。

sentences.english: Making use of the geometric relations, the location of the rays is accurate and timesaving.
sentences.chinese: 利用几何特性寻找射线，既准确又节省计算时间。

sentences.english: The intensity of the X-ray emission is correlated to thebrightness of the orange coloring.
sentences.chinese: X射线的辐射强度与橙色的亮度相关。

sentences.english: The CyberKnife System has been used extensively for spine radiosurgery.
sentences.chinese: 射线切除系统已经广泛应用于脊柱的放射外科。

sentences.english: At least five (5) percent of the welds are 100 percent radiographed or ultrasonically examined.
sentences.chinese: 至少5%的焊缝进行100%射线透照或超声检测。

sentences.english: X-ray digital imaging testing technology is a new method of nondestructive testing.
sentences.chinese: 射线数字成像检测是工业无损检测的新技术。

sentences.english: Some are asymptomatic and discovered as an incidental radiologic finding.
sentences.chinese: 这些病人仅在偶然的放射线检查时才被发现。
